title: Merge Two Sorted Lists
description: You are given the heads of two sorted linked lists `list1` and `list2`. Merge the two lists into one sorted list and return the head of the merged list.

examples.explanation: The merged list combines all elements from both lists in sorted order.
Both lists are empty, so the merged list is also empty.
list1 is empty, so the merged list contains all elements from list2.

constraints: The number of nodes in both lists is in the range [0, 50].
Both `list1` and `list2` are sorted in non-decreasing order.
